NezumiInteraction2: ^Nezumi:You’ve done well to complete Funé’s training. I think you are ready.
^Nezumi: Darwin, son, I’ve a confession to make. I’ve not been entirely forthcoming with you. Your grandfather was a dear friend to me, but also a brother in arms.

^Nezumi: Darwin, I’m a Free Mousin’. Your grandfather was a Free Mousin’. We are protectors of the light crystals that give life, joy, and prosperity to the world of Basilbrook. The symbol conveys to other mice who we are.

^Nezumi: It was your grandfather’s duty to guard the crystal shard in the Unbridled Wood. In his absence, the crystal has been compromised by the possums. Darwin, It was no accident that you ended up here.
^Darwin: Are you asking me to take my grandfather’s place?
^I’m nnn…not sss…sure I’m cut out for this..

c-0: ^And I’ll try my best to make him proud.
c-1: ^bbbutt..I guess if it’s the only way I’ll see my family again.
c-2: ^What if I don’t want to be a crystal guardian or whatever.

Dovetail: ^Nezumi:I understand that this is a lot to take in. And Darwin, know this..your grandfather would have never left his sword to you if he did not think you could do it.
^Darwin:Okay, what do I have to do?
^Nezumi: Julia Possum is the mother of the minions you fought. She fused herself with the crystal and has become corrupted by it. You must enter the wood once more. Find Julia, and fight her.
